name: password
title: :password Selector
desc: Selects all elements of type password.

entries.longdesc: $(':password') is equivalent to $('[type=password]'). As with other pseudo-class selectors (those that begin with a ":") it is recommended to precede it with a tag name or some other selector; otherwise, the universal selector ("*") is implied. In other words, the bare $(':password') is equivalent to $('*:password'), so $('input:password') should be used instead.
